name: Mild Panic Mornings
description: For people starting their work day with varying degrees of panic about what awaits them. The show acknowledges morning anxiety without being cheerful about it. The banter focuses on shared morning struggles and the performance of looking prepared.

presenters.notes: Mostly duo for conversation, occasional solo for focused segments

tone.mood: Controlled chaos, acknowledging morning panic without being cheerful about it

check_ins: For everyone pretending to have it together
The work day begins, ready or not
sample_lines: It's 7:30. Time to open your inbox and immediately regret it.
Shout out to everyone whose first meeting is at 9am and who definitely hasn't looked at the agenda.
The 7:42 to London is delayed. In other news, water is wet.
That was 'Morning Coffee Ritual' for Sarah who requested it. Sarah, may your Wi-Fi hold and your camera stay off.
Three unread email threads from yesterday. Today's going great already.

handover.style: Transition from early morning to work day proper, acknowledging the shift in energy

winter.tone_adjustment: Reference darkness, cold commutes, reluctance to leave bed

summer.tone_adjustment: Reference light mornings, nicer weather, easier to get up

autumn.tone_adjustment: Back-to-school energy in September even though listeners aren't in school

christmas_period.tone_adjustment: Acknowledge holiday time, people having time off, reduced traffic

new_year.tone_adjustment: First work day of the year energy, back to normal

ai_budget.notes: 50% talk = 90 minutes = 5400 seconds of TTS maximum, 50% music = 90 minutes
